thread.title: Raai Lakshmi to dance with Pawan Kalyan
thread.title_full: Raai Lakshmi to dance with Pawan Kalyan

author: Deccan
title: Raai Lakshmi to dance with Pawan Kalyan
text: Deccan Chronicle | September 03, 2015, 04.06 am Raai Lakshmi Popular Tamil actress Lakshmi Rai or Raai Lakshmi will be dancing with Pawan Kalyan in Sardar Gabbar Singh. “Here is the news to all #PawanKalyan fans I m doing an interesting important role in #SardarGabbarSingh excited! u will also c me shaking legs with him for the first time looking forwards. treat for my #Telugufans #excited (sic),” she tweeted. Kajal Aggarwal is playing the main female lead and the shooting of the film is going on at a brisk pace. K.S. Ravindra (Bobby) is directing the film, while Pawan Kalyan’s friend Sharath Marar is producing it. entertainment Tollywood Raai Lakshmi Pawan Kalyan Also Read Kim Kardashian poses nude for magazine Movie review 'Enakkul Oruvan': The climax will leave you melted and concentrated Pawan Kalyan’s beard mystery solved We are safe: Genelia D'Souza tweets about Thailand blast
